# kodes.tech llms.txt

> Automate business workflows by integrating websites, WhatsApp, and CRM to capture leads, respond instantly, and enhance efficiency for small to medium-sized enterprises.

- [Privacy Policy](https://kodes.tech/privacy-policy): Outlines Kodes Tech's privacy practices, data collection, user rights, and policy updates.
- [Kodes Tech Terms & Conditions](https://kodes.tech/terms-and-conditions): Outlines terms and conditions for using Kodes Tech's web development and related services.
- [Business Automation Services](https://kodes.tech): Promote automation services for website, WhatsApp, and CRM to enhance business efficiency.
